titleStmt.title: Great news from Ireland an account of the Kings royal camp before the city of Limmerick, and of a late defeat of the enemy there : with a particular relation of the C. of Tyrconnel's severity to the Bishop of Limmerick, and the actions of the French at Gallway.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for D. Smith in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
